nodes.text: Ta'a Chume's estate was an area of the Fountain Palace on Hapes where former Queen Mother Ta'a Chume resided and was held under house arrest after attempting to poison Teneniel Djo. It was here in 36 ABY, after the attempt on his daughter's life, that Jacen Solo used the Force to torture information out of Ta'a Chume and eventually gave her a brain hemorrhage, rendering her comatose.
